TextView.android:text: What is meant by Android development? Android software development - Wikipedia Android software development is the process by which applications are created for devices running the Android operating system. Google states that Android apps can be written using Kotlin, Java, and C++ languages using the Android software development kit (SDK), while using other languages is also possible.

By learning Android Development, you give yourself the best possible chance to reach any career goals you set. Once you get started, within no time, you'll land your dream job, have that promotion, or create a successful business of your own in the field of Android Development. What is Android and its importance?
Android is a software package and linux based operating system for mobile devices such as tablet computers and smartphones. It is developed by Google and later the OHA (Open Handset Alliance). Java language is mainly used to write the android code even though other languages can be used.
